alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 22 at 2:50PM CDT until April 23 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Marion, Baxter, Fulton, Boone County Except Southwest, Newton County Higher Elevations, Searcy County Lower Elevations, Boone County Higher Elevations, Newton County Lower Elevations, Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations and Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered or unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
